issue.title: Camera sensors not updated without shadows (and directional light) in scence

content.raw:
An important update:
It seems the camera image is only influenced by the directional light source and scene settings (e.g. ambient), but not by other light sources.
That is, if you add a point light your gz_client will show quite different images compared to the simulated camera - which I guess is unintended.

IMHO the goal for the simulated camera should be to show everything as in gz_client, of course without the GUI specific elements (arrows etc).

Note: I did not yet investigate the rendering path (gazebo / gazebo / rendering / Camera.cc) myself.
